extendedInfo.description: NOTE: This is a upgrade app for the free version of Chinese Character Trainer Pro.This app uses an intelligent algorithm to teach Chinese characters using flashcards. The characters are based on the Jun Da Character frequency list of Modern Chinese. Definitions are from CC-CEDICT.

reviews.comment: Great app! Fun to use, keeps you interested by keeping score. Could be improved by including example usage on the flip side of the flash card.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I can\'t get mine to work?
reviews.comment: I\'ve reinstalled it at least five times and it still doesn\'t show up in my apps?...so I can\'t even really say what I think of it ?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Originally had a problem installing the full version but emailed the developer who solved the problem straight away. Simple but very effective App.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: There\'s a reason I don\'t use it
reviews.comment: The free version was great,  but the upgrade presents way too many new cards in a row without review.  I hate the algorithm and unless it\'s fixed I won\'t use this.
reviews.author: Charles J. Daniels

reviews.comment: This app is the best one I\'ve come across in this genre. Great for building and reinforcing vocab as well as reinforced retention. Def a must have.
reviews.author: A Google User
